item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (319 points | 136 comments)
2. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (936 points | 725 comments)
3. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (248 points | 117 comments)
4. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (67 points | 9 comments)
5. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (609 points | 198 comments)
6. WiFi suspended at big UK train stations after 'cybersecurity incident' (38 points | 15 comments)
7. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (29 points | 9 comments)
8. Rewriting Rust (229 points | 181 comments)
9. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (262 points | 139 comments)
10. Posts about Spartan Mosquito (9 points | discuss)
11. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (199 points | 97 comments)
12. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (261 points | 85 comments)
13. Ask HN: Did you personal website help you get hired? Tell about it (16 points | 8 comments)
14. Wordpress.org bans WP Engine, blocks it from accessing its resources (59 points | 44 comments)
15. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (149 points | 44 comments)
16. OpenAI to Become For-Profit Company (17 points | 3 comments)
17. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (30 points | 7 comments)
18. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (175 points | 187 comments)
19. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (19 points | 6 comments)
20. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (131 points | 106 comments)
21. Register Allocation in the Go Compiler (14 points | discuss)
22. Why I still blog after 15 years (400 points | 204 comments)
23. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (297 points | 101 comments)
24. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (176 points | 57 comments)
25. Audio Masking (116 points | 18 comments)
26. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)
27. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (18 points | 3 comments)
28. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (656 points | 450 comments)
29. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (98 points | 44 comments)
30. Optimizing Guile Scheme (153 points | 57 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
